long_description: Perfect for your base camp or backcountry cabin, the Katadyn Gravidyn Drip water filter can supply 6 months of safe drinking water for up to 6 people with no pumping required! Fill with untreated water and walk away--water drips through 3 ceramic/activated carbon elements-return an hour later to 1 gallon of potable water. Double-stage reservoir holds over 2.5 gallons of tainted water in its upper chamber; lower collection basin features a dripless spigot. Small 0.2 micron pores in the ceramic elements trap pathogenic bacteria and protozoa, including giardia, crypto, cholera, salmonella and e.coli. High-quality food-grade plastic containers collapse to a small 10 x 18 inches ; functional size is 10 x 36 inches. Katadyn Gravidyn Drip water filter features field-serviceable ceramic/activated carbon elements that can be cleaned with an abrasive pad, included.
